ship.name: Llama Voyager
ship.description: The Llama's popularity is based on the wide availability of the base ship, and is most pilots introduction to spacefaring. Inspired by the popularity, Melendez Corporation released a premium series nicknamed Voyager. Although the new model nearly sports double the price tag, it comes with more efficient hyperdrive coupling, and more importantly, a built-in fuel ramscoop that is able to capture and filter minuscule space dust to slowly refill fuel.
